cause.description:
Guantanamo (and secret CIA prisons) have done more to help the terrorist cause than protect any of us. These type of practices, which are grossly contradictory to the type of free society we are proponents of, should be closed immediately.
1. All people have equal right to a legal process
2. Prolonged imprisonment without hope of legal process is tantamount to torture
cause.mission: Raise support for closure of military prisons.
cause.name: Shut Guantanamo
